__e: It seems like I was cursed by a one-eyed man!
He's not like the others. you know. He was the first. The betrayer.
I'm cursed to be married to a woman who's superb at her job.
I could not save my scholarship, but I'll be damned if I can not save my family.
Yeah, well, it has something to do with me, and I will be damned if I'll let you do it!
